greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table of max(x,y), where (x,y) = (0,0),(0,1),(1,0),(0,2),(1,1),(2,0),...
formula: G.f. (x+y-3xy+x^2 y^2)/((1-x)^2 (1-y)^2 (1-xy)). T(n,m) = n + m - min(n,m); a(n) = A003056(n) - A004197(n). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Feb 06 2006
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_
